name: simple comment
description: Simple comment is a small script (eight lines) to toggle line comment. It use "s" as trigger key. You can easily add more langages, take a look at the .vim !
install_details:
Add this next line to your vimrc, s can be another key.

map <silent> s :call Co(&ft)<CR>

Put the .vim in your plugin folder or in your home and add "so ~/simple_comment.vim" to your vimrc.
